General.Name: Theeb Rent a Car Company SJSC
General.Description: Theeb Rent A Car Company provides car rental and leasing services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company offers short and long-term leasing and other related services; and sells used vehicles. It also provides roadside assistance; and operates maintenance centers and insured car fleet. The company offers its services through 48 branches distributed over the regions of the Kingdom, international, and regional airports with fleet of vehicles approximately 19,000. Theeb Rent A Car Company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: North Ring Road between exits 12 & 13, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11423
